Miscellaneous Highlights: Coach Mike Brown found an 8-man rotation that felt comfortable, dynamic, and seamless.
Others: The first half consisted of a frenetic up and down pace, resulting in the Kings shooting just two free throws the entire time.
DeMar DeRozan gave 20 points on 9-14 from the field, he also dished out eight assists.
Collins scored 11 of his 18 points in the first half, with many of these coming from open looks in the soft spots of the Kingsâ€™ zone defense.
